Well of course, but my point is that is that they'll become the minority.

2050 USA:
"Mommy; why does that boy in my class look different?"
"That's cause he's a singular ethnicity"
"What's a 'ethnicity'?"
"Well dear his great great grandparents all came from only Europe instead of how our family came from all over"
"Oooh!"

topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54a2451163687202301d3000#post_54a2451163687202301d3000
Personally I think the modern military knives are the best because they're specifically designed to kill people and serves it's use instead of trying to be flashy about it.  Also you would never have to worry about it getting dull because it's designed to be dull.  I believe the marine combat knife is actually designed to stab someone's brains cause they teach you the proper way to do it is to stab, twist to a 90 degree angle and then pull out so that the person has no chance of surviving.  Also they're light weight unlike swords.  There's no real combat reason for swords in the military because if you're that close to someone you're either dead or you need your knife.  There's a reason why militaries don't use swords anymore other than for decoration.
